experience.title: Generative AI Intern
experience.description:
– Spearheaded the development of the unstructured data pipeline for TCS Data Wrangler to streamline data processing.
– Built a data wrangling automation pipeline to streamline complex data workflows, enhancing efficiency in data processing
and analysis.
– Integrated advanced natural language processing (NLP) techniques with AutoML for adaptive model selection and tuning.
– Engineered data chunking, embedding generation, and similarity search using Chroma, Milvus, and FAISS
– Optimized the handling of high-dimensional data and accelerated retrieval tasks by 40%.
